pkgmetadata.longdescription: The DSI utilities are a mish mash of classes accumulated during the last ten years in projects developed at the DSI (Dipartimento di Scienze dell'Informazione, e.g., Information Sciences Department) of the Universit√† degli Studi di Milano. They were originally distributed in several projects (mainly in MG4J) but we finally decided to gather all the material in a single place.
